name: Mrs. Yoon BnB

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Considering quality/price, this is a really nice place to stay in.
reviews.title: Kind, clean and well located

reviews.text: The owners – Monica and her husband – are very kind and thoughtful. We originally booked a small studio at a special offer, but Mrs. Yoon changed it for a bigger room without extra charge, saying that the studio is too small for two people.
reviews.title: cozy room / near subway

reviews.text: We didn’t know how a guesthouse worked in Korea, and asked them to change towels every day. Monica offered us extra set of towels and changed them every time we asked, though guesthouses in Korea usually do not offer change of towels (Monica, sorry for this again. We really didn’t know). Also they speak fluent English.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay in...I like it will come back again...

reviews.text: The room which we stayed in was quite austere but spacious and clean, and the air conditioner was our savior in such a hot and humid climate. The rooms of Mrs. Yoon’s B&B are scattered in several buildings, and they run a restaurant O2C2 in one of the buildings. The ambience of the O2C2 is very nice and cozy, and the food is great.
reviews.title: Morning Calm

reviews.text: The location is really good and convenient. It is only a two minute walk to the subway station Samgakji, which is close to central points of Seoul. Major attractions of Seoul are located only few subway stops away from Samgakji. The house is located in a tranquil residential area, so that you can take a rest without any noise.
reviews.title: Wonderful

description: Mrs.Yoon BnB is very happy to provide you comfortable Bed and yummy Breakfast during you staying our precious & themed rooms. The breakfast will be served at Mrs.Yoon’s own restaurant named theMAKING. Our valued guests will love & enjoy the following facts of Mrs.Yoon BnB: 1. Themed & tidy rooms: from Single room, Dormitory to Studio apartment2. Transportation: 3 min walk to Metro #4 line Samgakji station (It takes only 4~8 min from here to Itaewon or Myeongdong). Convenient travelling hub (Seoul train station – 6 min away) for trip to outside of Seoul.3. Shopping: E-mart, I-Park (10 min walk)4. Entertainment: CGV, Dragonhill Spa, Itaewon5. Vintage & Gift shop: Unique British & European vintage goods
